Reviews.Title: What a camera!
Reviews.Author: Mike Shapiro "Miami Mike"
Reviews.Content: I have been a professional photog since 1971 and have spent well over $75,000 in equipment including digital camera's sicnce they starting coming out around 1998. This is by far the BEST camera I have ever owned. Right out of the box with 2 extra batteries, I shot 997 photos at a toy run event and only 6 did not come out sharp or incorrectly exposed. I also shot 6 HD video's and every one is terrific. two of these and you would be able to tackle most jobs. (I always bring 2 or more camera's on any shoot) And for $500 this was a bargain!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera Package
Reviews.Author: DandyDan
Reviews.Content: Great camera, everything it was supposed to do, it does and even more... And great extra package that came with it ... all the necessary accessories.

Reviews.Title: Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: mark behrman
Reviews.Content: Very easy set up and use. Great auto adjust for pictures in light and dark. I have recommended this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Lowell L. Ashbaugh
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. The lens is excellent and the feature set includes nearly everything I wanted. The only thing I would like added to it is a GPS option, but since I've never had one in a camera before I don't really miss it.I've been experimenting with the camera before taking it on a trip to New Zealand. I've had moderately high-end cameras in the past, and this is my favorite so far. The lens has a remarkable 25-600mm range (35mm equivalent) at f/2.8 for the entire range. The picture is clear and both the rear display and the electronic viewfinder show it brightly.I've tested several shooting modes so far, including still photos with exposure options, video, high-speed video, and burst-mode photography. They've all worked as expected. I'm now experimenting with exposure options.The package of items the camera came with is very useful. The case is by Vivitar, and holds everything easily. Two extra batteries ensure having power. The Travel Charger can be used in the car or with 120-240V AC. The SD card has plenty of capacity (even though I purchased another just to be certain when I travel). The only item that's not very useful is the tripod - it's rather light so I would not trust it. I'll use my gorilla grip tripod, instead. The vendor, Sunset Electronics, was extremely responsive when I discovered an error. The Travel Charger that came with the package was for a Nikon, and the USB-SD card adapter did not work. When I contacted them, Sunset Electronics immediately sent out the correct replacement items. There was no charge and they did not request return of the faulty ones. I would buy from them again without hesitation.If anything else comes up as I test it further, I'll add to this review.

Reviews.Title: The One I always Wanted
Reviews.Author: Barbara Pringle
Reviews.Content: I have had a couple of friends tell me the Panasonic Lumix FZ200 is the Best camera they have owned, the one friend showed me hers and she said she Loves it. So, I bought one just like hers and now I can say she is right, I Love it also. Great camera.Barbara Pringle

Reviews.Title: Yes! Yes! Yes!
Reviews.Author: Regina Swanson
Reviews.Content: Everything good that the reviews give this camera.  Nothing bad about this camera.  Nothing misrepresented, I have purchased many cameras over MANY years and this is by far the best camera purchase I have made.  What can you say bad about a Leica 2.8 lens the full zoom range?

Reviews.Title: Fz200
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Donnelly
Reviews.Content: Everything the reviews said it would be! I have enjoyed the range this camera has given me. I added a clear high end lens filter for my own peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera.  Great Package
Reviews.Author: Bret Legg
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife, who wanted to take high quality pictures without the hassle of changing out lenses on a DSLR.  It's got a great 26X zoom.  Though this is not as powerful as some zooms out there, the sweet thing about this lens is that it keeps a 2.8 f-stop throughout the entire range of the zoom, making it a much faster lens than many of the others.  The package gives you two extra batteries, so you'll never run out of juice.  The case that comes in the package is a little small and not very thick.  I will probably replace it.  All in all, I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: elfie411
Reviews.Content: This camera is what I expected. It has a learning curve but with patience one can learn to use it efficiently. I have taken many great pictures in the short time I have had the camera.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Caro
Reviews.Content: Looking at the quality and price, the camera met our needs as far as an all-around camera.  Ease of use is one of the many qualities, more like a point and shoot.  Very good camera for not only the first time user, but also for the professional.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: ama5
Reviews.Content: So far it has been awesome! I got a great amount of extras for the money. I am a novice but this camera is making it easy for me to learn. The manual is very good. It tells the parts and then gives a page number to refer to.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for what I need
Reviews.Author: Ru
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera as you've probably read in a number of reviews. I would definitely buy it again. The shipping was very fast and everything that was mentioned was included. Just an FYI the additional products are NOT authentic Panasonic products, including the spare batteries. They are by a brand called X-it Photo. That being said I really like the case and the other stuff that comes with the package. The camera is supurb and that's really all I care about.

Reviews.Title: Terrific zoom and lens speed
Reviews.Author: David Tattersall
Reviews.Content: This camera provides the capability of a DSLR without the weight and extra lenses.  The package deal provides all you need.  An excellent deal.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 MP MOS Sensor; LSI Venus Engine Image Processor
25-600mm f/2.8 Leica Optical Zoom Lens; 3.0" Free Angle 460K-dot LCD Display
RAW and RAW+JPEG Recording Option; 0.2" Electronic View Finder w/ 100% FOV
12 FPS Continuous Shooting; Full HD 60p Video Recording
Hot-Shoe Accessory Mount
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix FZ200 Digital Camera with SSE 16GB Point & Shoot Advanced Package
